column1: # Readings for 1910-1912 are for the Boltby Cliff Head No 1 site (SE494867) where the gauge resided before moving to the village.
# The gauge moved further to the south east of the village at the start of 1918.
# The reading for October 1915 is an estimate and has been omitted.
# The reading for October 1917 is marked as unreliable and has been omitted.
